name: Cursor
strength: Great for rapid refactor and project wide edits
description: Local dev editor with agent features for code tasks
limitations: Needs repo context and user guidance
how_to_connect: Open the repo and enable agent context
sample_prompt: Open src and refactor components to use hooks and strict types

name: Claude Code
description: Agent that reads many files and writes patch style output
limitations: Rate limits on very large repos
how_to_connect: Open folder in Claude Code workspace
sample_prompt: Upgrade the Playground to stream step cards and keep type safety

name: n8n
description: Drag and drop automations that call APIs and schedule jobs
sample_prompt: When a memory is saved post a message to a webhook with JSON payload

name: Zapier
how_to_connect: Create a Zap and expose a catch hook
sample_prompt: Send compare results to a Google Sheet with cost and latency columns

name: LangChain
how_to_connect: Install package and wire tool interfaces
sample_prompt: Create a chain with a planner tool memory and an output step

name: Notion
description: Pull pages and blocks for retrieval
sample_prompt: Summarize top three pages about team onboarding and return links

name: Google Drive
description: List and read files from a folder
sample_prompt: Find the latest CSV in the reports folder and compute a weekly rollup

name: Web Scraper
description: Simple fetch and parse with selectors
sample_prompt: Fetch the schedule page and extract title date and venue for items

name: CodexGPT
description: Executes code in a sandbox and returns stdout
sample_prompt: Run the given Python snippet and return printed values
